籤詩故事一:
◇Liu Bei recruits a bride
After the Battle of Chibi, Sun Quan was eager to regain Jingzhou, which had been acquired by Liu Bei, so he used Zhou Yu's plan, pretending that he wanted to betroth his sister Sun Ren to Liu Bei, but in fact he wanted to take Liu Bei as a hostage to claim Jingzhou.
After Zhuge Liang spied on Zhou Yu's plan, he handed the brochure with the strategy to Zhao Yun, who was protecting Liu Bei when he went to Soochow. Zhao Yun followed the strategy in the brochure and deliberately made a big splash to let Wu Guotai (Sun Quan's father) know about the marriage proposal. Because Wu Guotai loved his daughter and was unwilling to make casual decisions about her daughter's life-long affairs, she scolded Sun Quan for being ruthless to his sister and proposed to personally test whether Liu Bei was worthy of his daughter at Ganlu Temple. After Wu Guotai met Liu Bei, she greatly appreciated Liu Bei and strongly advocated the marriage between Liu Bei and his daughter. As a result, Liu Bei successfully married Mrs. Sun.
Later, Liu Bei and Mrs. Sun fled back to Jingzhou together. Later, Sun Quan wanted to sneak attack Jingzhou while Liu Bei was attacking Yizhou, but was stopped by Wu Guotai, who was worried about his daughter's safety.
He said: "Zhou Yu's clever plan is the best in the world. He lost his wife and lost his troops."
(Liu Bei gained from harm)
